goal.tools.unittest.testsection

Class AssertTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.unittest.testsection.AssertTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestSection

    public class AssertTest
extends java.lang.Object
implements TestSection
    A mental state test is executed on the agents RunState. This can be used to check if a certain condition holds once the agent has executed the modules under test.
    Author:
    M.P. Korstanje

      • run

        public TestSectionResult run(RunState<? extends ObservableDebugger> runState)
                      throws AssertTestFailed
        Runs the mental state test against the agents run state. This will query the agents belief base.
        Specified by:
        run in interface TestSection
        Parameters:

        Returns:
